name: Create Onsite Notification with Existing Template
scenarioId: Onsite:Create Onsite Notification with Existing Template
methodName: Create Onsite Notification with Existing Template

testSteps.description: 1: Create Onsite Notification with Existing Template ({title=Updated-13, templateName=Personalisation_Test})

children.description: Given I Navigate to "On-site Notifications" page via "Web Personalization"
Then I clicked on create notification button
Then I added the new campaign tile name as Updated-13
Then I selected the audience type as show to Unknown user
Then I clicked on save&continue button
Then I applied template type filter "GLOBAL"
Then I Searched and Selected the template with name "Just Arrived"
Then I clicked on save&continue button
Then I clicked on save&continue button
Then I clicked on launchCamapign button

userStory.narrative: I want to use this template for my feature file

title: Create Onsite Notification with Existing Template

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I Navigate to "On-site Notifications" page via "Web Personalization"
Then I clicked on create notification button
Then I added the new campaign tile name as <title>
Then I selected the audience type as show to Unknown user
Then I clicked on save&continue button
Then I applied template type filter "GLOBAL"
Then I Searched and Selected the template with name "Just Arrived"
Then I clicked on save&continue button
Then I clicked on save&continue button
Then I clicked on launchCamapign button
